parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock all cargo positions of a vehicle or lock by index.
This command will remove user "get in" action (not get out) but will also stop player getting into vehicle via script commands (e.g [[moveInCargo]]) unlike [[lock]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[lockCargo]] lock </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> vehicle [[lockCargo]] [index, lock]  </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]   </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, lock]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> lock: [[Boolean]]   </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>vehicleName [[lockCargo]] [[true]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>vehicleName [[lockCargo]] [0, [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[lock]], [[setVehicleLock]], [[lockDriver]], [[lockedCargo]], [[lockTurret]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
